title: Please help, my client won't load tft and is stuck on TFT reconnect.

embed.description: Gyazo is a simple way to share screenshots, GIFs, and replays in seconds. Take interesting and useful captures from games, apps, and sites instantly.

body:
EVery single time i play a tft game, it will not connect and i keep spamming the reconnect button to no avail, when i restart the client and log in, that's what show's up.
WHat can i do?

replies.body: Yeah so even though the games over it's still stuck on what you see, sometimes i relog and i get 'reconnect' button again, but it's just stuck .. woohoo
